cars.name: Bently Continental GT
cars.desc: Very few vehicles share the exclusivity and customization options that the Bentley Continental GT offers. This $200,000-plus two-door grand tourer is one of the most luxurious vehicles you can buy. It's highly customizable, offers a convertible model and was completely redesigned for the 2020 model year.
